policyname: Admins can manage all post blocks
qual:
(EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM profiles
  WHERE ((profiles.id = auth.uid()) AND (profiles.role = 'admin'::text))))
with_check:
(EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM profiles
  WHERE ((profiles.id = auth.uid()) AND (profiles.role = 'admin'::text))))
